name: gpt-tokenizer
description: a pure javascript implementation of a bpe tokenizer (encoder/decoder) for gpt-2 / gpt-3 / gpt-4 and other openai models
kwds: a pure javascript implementation of a bpe tokenizer (encoder/decoder) for gpt-2 / gpt-3 / gpt-4 and other openai models bpe encoder decoder tokenizer gpt gpt-2 gpt-3 gpt-3.5 gpt-4 nlp natural language processing text generation openai machine learning ml
